Type.Name: DragAction

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DragAction extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Used in to indicate what the destination should do with the dropped data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.DragAction Ask = int32(32)

Docs.summary: Ask t user what to do with the data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.DragAction Copy = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype Gdk.DragAction Default = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The default action. The same as the Copy action.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.DragAction Link = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Add a link to the data. Note that this is only useful if source and destination agree on what it means.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.DragAction Move = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Move the data, i.e. first copy it, then delete it from the source using the DELETE targetof the X selection protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.DragAction Private = int32(16)

Docs.summary: Special action which tells the source that the destination will do something that the source doesn't understand.
